item.description:
When: Every Wednesday (starting from June 13th), 12:30 to 2 PM

Hello all!

We have managed to put together a Summer Lunch Meetup over at MIT. This will act as the summer extension to the Japanese Lunch Table that already takes place at MIT during the academic year. Anyway, we meet every Wednesday from 12:30 to 2:00 pm to enjoy casual language exchange. Of course, all ages are welcome and feel free to bring your friends and family.

Until we have a more permanent location established, we will meet up at the 1st floor Stata Center dining area. Stata Center can be easily reached from the Kendall/MIT T stop.

Please check out this web page for 4 photos of Stata Center (trust me, this building is very easy to find):
http://www.csail.mit....

Also, I have edited a small MIT campus map that can be found here:
http://www.mit.edu/~r...

Simple directions:
From the Kendall/MIT T Stop, follow along Main Street past The Coop, The Kendall, Legal Sea Foods, and Ames Street. Stata Center will be on your left on the corner of Vassar and Main Street.

See you then!
item.name: Summer Lunch Table
